stmt.name: create_master
create_detail
stmt.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `detail` ( `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, `master_id` INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (`master_id`) REFERENCES `master` (`id`) )

stmt.name: select_2
stmt.sql: SELECT m.`id` m_id, d.`id` d_id FROM `master` m LEFT JOIN `detail` d ON d.`id` = ( SELECT dd.`id` FROM `detail` dd WHERE dd.`master_id` = m.`id` ORDER BY dd.`id` DESC LIMIT 1 )

stmt.name: select_3
select_4
stmt.sql: SELECT x.* FROM ( SELECT 1, 2 UNION SELECT 3, 4 ) x

stmt.name: select_5
stmt.sql: SELECT x.* FROM ( SELECT 'foo' UNION ALL SELECT 'foo' ) x
